atlantis.framework

Class Vector2

  • java.lang.Object
    • atlantis.framework.Vector2

  • public class Vector2
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a 2-dimensional vector
    Author:
    Yannick

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vector2()
      Create a default vector with X and Y equal 0.
